DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate lens wettability contact lenses use investigational multi-purpose disinfect solution .
DOC.criteria: 18 year age old normal eye , correction refractive error . At least 5 day successful daily wear ( minimum 8 hour per day ) PureVision® , Acuvue® Oasys™ , Acuvue® 2 contact lens prior Visit 1 Vision correctable 20/30 ( Snellen ) good eye distance lenses Visit 1 ( Day 0 Baseline ) . Grade 0 Grade 1 wettability eye least 15 minute lens wear Visit 1 ( Day 0 Baseline ) . Other protocoldefined inclusion criterion may apply . Any ocular systemic medical condition may , opinion investigator , preclude safe administration test article affect result study . Need wear contact lens extend wear basis ( i.e. , overnight ) study . Use product multipurpose solution hydrogen peroxide solution , include daily enzyme cleaner saline rinse , lens care least 7 day prior Visit 1 ( Day 0 Baseline ) . Use overthecounter ( OTC ) prescribe topical ocular medication within 7 day prior Visit 1 . Use lens rewetting drop acceptable . History current ocular infection ocular inflammatory event . Ocular surgery within past year . Participation investigational study within past 30 day . Other protocoldefined exclusion criterion may apply .
